name: Rocket Bytes
storyline: Rocket Bytes is a 1-bit precision rocket flying reverse platformer for Playdate where you control a group of rockets who need to collect energy and bring it back to their ship (a bigger rocket) so they can fly it safely back to their mothership (an even bigger rocket).
summary: A precision rocket flying reverse platformer

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: Making a Game You Play... WITH A CRANK??? [Playdate Console]
